rss.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Fentimans Lemon Shandy
entry.summary:
Score: 26 (out of 100) / Rank: 107th (out of 115 beers) / Spotted this one at my local farm shop and didn’t realise until I got home that it was 0.5% ABV. So adding it to the list
It was very much a soft drink and was very sweet, with a very light bitterness in the after taste. Not helped as England conceded to Germany as I drank this
Not really going to trouble the scorers but reminded me o...

entry.title: Clear Head
entry.summary:
Score: 90 (out of 100) / Rank: 2nd (out of 115 beers) / The first mental health beer where the proceeds go towards Talk Club which is a talking and listening movement to help people get mentally fit.
This one poured with a vibrant colour and a small head, the taste was smooth with a nice bitter aftertaste, it went down really well.
Overall a great beer and a great cause!!
Check ...

entry.title: Ambar 0,0%
entry.summary:
Score: 43 (out of 100) / Rank: 79th (out of 115 beers) / This one poured with very little head but I couldn’t pick up anything in the smell.
There wasn’t really much in the taste apart from a slight bitter aftertaste.
Not one that I will be rushing back to.
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on my Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey) or Get £10 off your first order at Honest...

entry.title: Into the mountains
entry.summary:
Score: 66 (out of 100) / Rank: 35th (out of 115 beers) / I had this one after I got home from a walk which had the toughest climb I had done for a while and needed to take my mind off my achy legs. Not quite into a mountain!
My first beer from South Africa and it poured with a lively head and a strong fruity smell. The taste was refreshing with a slight bitterness.
It went down really well a...

entry.title: Smashed Citrus
entry.summary:
Score: 71 (out of 100) / Rank: 22nd (out of 115 beers) / So another fruity beer on the list and this one in the Smashed range where
This one poured will a healthy fizz but I couldn’t pick up any citrus in the smell. The taste reminded me of a lager and lime from the Coop as a kid.
Now its unusal but a fruity beer is pipping the other two in my Drynks Unlimited rankings and is certainly one t...
